blogs.title: What is test-driven development?
blogs.excerpt: Test-driven development (TDD), is an evolutionary approach to development that combines test-first development where you write a test before you write just enough production code to fulfil that test and refactoring.

blogs.title: Styling Audio tag
blogs.excerpt: As a frontend developer, one of my biggest frustration is to style replaced elements. It can be a daunting task when on deadlines with designs to match.

blogs.title: Git Commands I learnt this week
blogs.excerpt: Git is a version control system (VCS) for tracking changes in computer files and coordinating work on those files among multiple people. It is primarily used for source code management in software development

blogs.title: What I know about object-oriented programming
blogs.excerpt: It is a programming paradigm based on the concept of, which may contain data, in the form of fields, often known as attributes; and code, in the form of procedures, often known as methods

blogs.title: Version Control(Git)
blogs.excerpt: This is a software that helps software developers to work together and maintain a complete history of their work.
